title: Dutch Submarines, Part-1: Submarines on exercise in 1928 in colour!

sources.title: Dutch Submarines, Part-1: Submarines on exercise in 1928 in colour!
sources.description: Interesting film about the Dutch Navy's submarines in 1928. Among other, it shows the subs Hr.Ms. O 10 and Hr.Ms. O 11 and Van Berkel seaplanes in action as well as the very old Hr.Ms. Koningin Emma der Nederlanden converted into a floating barracks. The Hr.Ms. O 10 went into service on 1 September 1926 and the Hr.Ms. O 11 on 18 January 1926 The original B&W film has been motion-stabilized, speed-corrected, contrast- and brightness enhanced, de-noised and A.I. upscaled and colorized. If you like my work and wish to DONATE then please goto: https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/Rick8... Email: ricksfilmrestoration@gmail.com Bron onbewerkte Z/W film: Beeld en Geluid. Timeline (with thanks to Henk Munnik and NIMH): 00:00 Submarine Hr.Ms. O 10: torpedo being loaded 00:22 Engines of the Hr.Ms. O 10 below deck 00:45 Hr. Ms. Koningin Emma der Nederlanden (1879), "Wachtschip" (floating barracks) 00:57 Cruiser (pantserdekschip) Hr.Ms. Gelderland (1900) in the distance 01:04 Submarine Hr.Ms. O 10 01:34 Three Van Berkel Seaplanes 02:20 Two Z-class Torpedo boats, one of them is the Hr.Ms. Z5 03:08 Naval vessel Hr.Ms. G12 03:18 Van Berkel Seaplanes 03:23 The O10 and O11 fire their 8,8 cm guns with high elevation 04:04 Submarines Hr.Ms. O 10 and Hr.Ms. O 11 in convoy 04:26 Three Van Berkel Seaplanes 04:30 Submarine Hr.Ms. O 10 04:46 Submarine Hr.Ms. O 11 05:02 Submarine Hr.Ms. O 10 05:44 Periscope of the submerged Hr.Ms. O 10 05:55 Torpedo trail of the fired torpedo 06:28 Naval vessel Hr.Ms. G12 06:34 The practice torpedo is retrieved.
